name: Smiley Match 3 Puzzle Game
description: Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the toys from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. No more crushing candies, breaking diamonds, crunching cookies or farming. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!
